title: Mahmoud Abdel-Aty
summary: Mahmoud Abdel-Aty is an Egyptian professor of mathematics and information science at Sohag University and the Mathematics Department at Zewail City of Science, Technology and Innovation. He is an elected fellow and the former North Africa Vice President of the African Academy of Sciences, the President of the Egyptian National Committee for the International Mathematical Union, and the Director of the Center for International Relations at Sohag University.[1][2][3]
